name: Pat Smith
text: Closed. Has been for about 10 years. Building is falling in.

name: Julie McMahon
text: Love this place so much!!! The food is incredible! The Dancers are really nice and Jazz the bartender is so amazing! I love coming in here to unwind and kick back! Definitely recommend this place among all the other adult entertainment areas in North Alabama. If you come in here and don't have a good time, it's your own damn fault!

name: Kenneth Mendel
text: I had a great time there. The LADIES were very sexy and beautiful,  Everyone there was very professional and nice.  Had a  blast..

name: Santiago White
text: Me and my wife visit fairly often, but had stopped for a few months because really no one pays us any mind. Last night changed that! There were a different crop of ladies, most of them friendly. But who really stood out with us was Sexy Lexi Rainz!!! We were fortunate enough to spend some time with her. As someone with her status, I thought maybe she would have been slightly snobby, but boy was I wrong. She is probably the sweetest, nicest and down to earth dancer we have ever met!!! As long as she continues to dance there, we will continue to bring our business. Way to set the bar Cherry by having that type of quality at the club!!!

name: Joe Boxer
text: What a great night for my bachelor party. Plenty of hot girls and the wings were phenomenal. Classy staff. I highly recommend this place. We will be back😉

name: Tom Brennan
text: To my pleasant surprise, I was in Huntsville on business Tuesday. There were 20+ girls and a variety of girls for my viewing pleasure.  Who knew that the chicken wings here would be the best i had ever eaten.  I'll be back for sure.

name: Misti Vall
text: I love this place and the people who work here. The girls are sexy and smart. The food is awesome. It's always a good vibe.

name: Mark Doss
text: Been going there now for about 6 months  and love the girls on day shift always have a good time.

name: Kevin Da King
text: the most beautiful bartender...she’s angel for sure..completely turned me down lol. Guess she doesn’t like waffle house.... Oh well

name: Jamie Jones
text: I visited The Cherry while in Huntsville for the tattoo expo after meeting the Dj at the event. I was impressed by the club overall. However I wasn't at all impressed by the short white tattooed bartender. She was very rude and not attractive at all. I've always heard about southern hospitality however she was lacking in any type of charm. We went to the other bartender and she was amazing. If you're in there and want great service avoid the white one with tattoos.

name: Brigido
text: Dancers are always harrasing you to pay for a prívate dance or sexual favors but it's a lie because they are not allow to do that. Last time I pay for a prívate there she didnt take her clothes off and if you talk with somebody about it they kick you out of the club, probably because they are part of this scam. Don't waste youre money just go somewhere else.

name: Mark Wright
text:
I have been to strip clubs all over nevwr seen an honest stripper, until last night. Went to cherry club to see there feature,  ended up getting a dance with a dancer named lexi.
Did a 1 hour vip asked her the price she said 280 I think, I gave her the money she took it to pay and brought me 20 dollars back, I said what is this , she replied it was only 260.00.  Wow wow wow, I was floored.  Beauty, class, honesty in a dancer.  Great job cherry.  Lexi has won you a new patron

name: Greg Wiseman
text: I love the cherry visit everytime im home. Just wonder why your not putting the hottest thing in huntsville out there more   Lexi is definitely the hottest thing to cone thru this area in a long time. She is classy, sweet, and sexy as hell .   As long as she is there ill keep coming.

name: Wade Calloway
text:
Had to post this, traveled thru Huntsville for 2 days. Went to this club last night Friday the 12th, was kinda thinking was not going to be much to see.

Well if you ever travel thru Huntsville stip in here, there is a dancer in this club named Lexi, and she is amazing.

Beautiful, sweet, intelligent, not at all stuck on herself. She actually takes time to speak to you and listen.  Not just your typical tey to get your money and bolt, most strip clubs. Lol.

To the owner kudos, great job with her. I will visit everytime Im in the area. And thank.you Lexi for being so genuine

Wade

name: Jose
text: I visited Sunday. Sucked. Decided to try again on a Wednesday. Still sucks. The Goones on stage should be tipping me to drink here. I usually goto The Pony. Beer is a dollar cheaper there & the girls are hot especially Jade. Sweet, sexy, southern girl. Wait... Why am I still here?!?! BYE FELICIA !!!

name: Justin Pitts
text: Great Atmosphere! Great Food! Best line up in town!

name: kirsti Billions
text: I work across the parking lot n it seems they have more business now that there is a new owner

name: Michael Hinson
text:
First time at the cherry,  ot sure if the girl Lexi wasca feature dancer or dances there regularly,  but this girl is a goddess.  Tall, blonde not fake blonde legit blonde, fit, classy, sexy  and the nicest person you could ever talk to.

You can tell speaking to her she is educated as well.  She was as sweet to my friends and I  as could be.  Never pushy actually paid attention to us when we spoke.  We didnt feel like we were only being played to get our money. ( we know we were lol , but at least we didnt feel like it )

We will definitely be back, thanks to this dancer.  To the owner great job with this dancer, she def takes your club to a new level and made our experience wonderful.

Madmike

name: Justin Widener
text: This is not a strip club. They dance with clothes on. Lol. They do not get naked with so ever!!!

name: Lewis Blackmon
text: Two real complaints.Great right up until they do the after hours party. The mix Dj ruins the feel of a real strip club. If you want a good strip club with a great Dj then get there before they start the after hours party. Also the tattooed white bartender on night shift is an absolute eye sore. Whoever hired her must be blind. She's rude and ugly not a good combination for selling drinks.

name: Mike Vaughn
text: Way to go Cherry, love me some Lexi.

name: Colton Godsy
text:
This place will try to take money from you if you even take your phone out of your pocket and call an Uber. One of the "ladies" thought she was being photographed and STOLE  the phone out of a friend's hand. Then said it'll be $20 to get his phone back.

This place is a struggling night club that tries to nickel and dime every customer to make sure the bills are paid.

Do not support this place. It will be out of business soon. Let it die of the poor service and lack of anything but overpriced beer. If you want a fun time with friends or even by yourself, go elsewhere. It's a dump not worthy of your money.

name: Luis Hdz
text: Sad that the staff is very good and the place is very nice but the manager is stupid I was trying to see thru the window of the place was busy or not and asked him and he got upset he kicked me out for that reason I think he should remain profesional with their customer , I been a customer for more than 2 years but I won't be back with that poor customer service from the manager , I know every person from the staff they are very nice , I really think the manager was drunk

name: JamieNicole_
text: this place has went down hill with girls dayshift has old women who look like they are on meth.. night shift let's there girls run the club the skinny black blonde is stuck up rude and thinks she is better then the other girls I was there 10 mins I told her I would get a dancer later she told me I was a cheap broke mother f***** I had a pocket full i ended up with a 30 min from from peaches and karma ask for them they are not so stuck up

name: Dana Lipscomb
text:
Courtney was awesome
Made me comfortable

name: Sharon Love
text:
Nastiest most foul strip club in the South!!!
One of the dancers and a staff member were seen getting it on inside of a car in the parking lot. The manager there is a huge meth head that keeps all the girls supplied and strung out. I was told that he even has children with multiple dancers there. We only spent about 3 hours there total and I saw enough to make me realize it's just a cesspool for Huntsville's trashiest people.
If you go there be prepared to get pregnant or acquire a staph infection if you touch anything. Take lots and lots of hand sanitizer!!!
I wish there was a "no stars" rating option for this place!!

name: Darren Mullinax
text:
Came on a Thursday. No girls on stage. Recording kept announcing dancers but it was empty.

Bar was empty but it took 20 minutes to get a drink. Everyone was nice though. Not upscale per se but not a scary /intimidating environment.

name: Kyle Smitherman
text: The dancers are awesome, and beautiful loved them. The security needs to be evaluated though, they are obviously beefed up on testerone andante very easily intimidated. Got kicked out for making 1 joke to one of the security guards, and he took it way too far. They are rude and then get mad when you call them out for being rude. Absolutely ridiculous. Needs better management.

name: Will Henson
text: Spent a lot of my early 20's there. Great place to hang out with friends.

name: Ross Williams
text: The people that leave negative feedback on google about Sammys are just “Cheap and weird”. Sammys is amazing, the staff was friendly. Enjoyed bar and drinks! Very talented girls dancing, will be back!

name: muhree Lalonde
text: If your looking for a club near downtown birmingham that is casually entertaining and classy guaranteed to lift your spirits with Beautiful lady's . I don't know if they still have day shift hours or not but either way your welcomed to be yourself and have some fun!relaxing atmosphere only thing missing is a snack bar of some sort with that I couldn't complain!!02•2021

name: Luke Hughes
text: Sammy’s is one of the best clubs I have been to. The ladies are all extremely nice and good at what they do!!! Will go back again and highly recommend to everyone looking for a great time.

name: Kane Head
text: Worst stripe club in the us.been to stripe clubs all over. This is by far the worst!!!!

name: Jerome Sanz
text: The best to offer in Alabama.

name: Adam Banks
text: Decent club, kinda needs updating. Low ceilings compared to the ft Walton location, which is very nice. Girls are ok as well. Ft Walton is far better.

name: Greg Radcliffe
text: Came in from out of town with some business colleagues and right away a very pretty girl came up to me and we chatted for a bit and I decided to take her to the VIP room to see how it was being as I’m not from here. The young gal was very nice and danced lovely, I have no complaints there. My complaint is that several other dancers and hostesses or waitresses whatever have you were filming and taking photographs which I find very unprofessional. Flash photography and videography is prohibited in the clubs I have previously been to up state. I don’t think a lot of men go to clubs looking for their photos plastered on websites or whatever may come of them. I told the gal I didn’t appreciate cameras around and she assured me they were not taking photos of the customers. I felt like my privacy was invaded especially if you are paying good money for privacy in VIP and I sure hope this policy is updated. Again, my dancer was very kind and pretty, I very much enjoyed her company but I can’t see myself going back due to that reason.

name: Jonathan Mcnatt
text: It was a lot of fun, lots of fine women there. Drinks where strong the way I like them. Went twice and I will come back again.

name: Stephen Willmon
text: Been going to Sammy's since the early '80s. I admire the way in which it's managed. You can always count on a good time. Good variety of ladies and respect is always there so long as you give it. High five to security for those that can't seem to be gentlemen. I've made tremendous friends over the years!! Greatful customer always-see you soon!!!!

name: Kristen Gober
text: If I could give no stars I would. I got kicked out and cause I quote “because of my smart mouth.” Literally didn’t say anything rude. They made me wait at the door for no reason then kicked me out. So I went and spent my money else where their lose I guess.

name: Senior Mwiti
text:
I decided to visit Sammy's adult club to unwind after a long week. I noticed after my last visit in Dec. 2015, that the club had really changed and not in a good way. The first thing I noticed is how the club had hired very unfriendly and unprofessional staff. The bouncer a five foot bald black guy looked very creepy and weird, he looked like bouncers you would meet in ghetto clubs. My friends and some of relatives who USED to frequent the club kept saying that this particular bouncer was rude, unpolished, and should not be working in a high end club like Sammy's.

He pretends to be the management, but you can see that he has no customer service experience at all. This bouncer has some serious issues, that need to be addressed by management. There are a lot of complaints on social media about this particular bouncer and management seem to be hiding their heads in the sand.

I might also add that some of the girls are less than average. I found it very difficult tipping girls that I didn't think that should be allowed to strip dance on a public stage.

Sammy's used to be a classy and very customer friendly club in Birmingham, not anymore. A lot of my friends and relatives have recommended that I try "The Furnace club". I will not be going back to Sammy's any time soon, that's for sure. If you are spending your hard earned money you at least expect good customer service and a friendly environment. A bouncer is the first staff member you get to see and therefore, a creepy and rude one is very telling of the outlook of the club in general.

name: Johnny Long
text: I do not go out much but starting going to Sammys and i meet this girl her dance name was  Kitten .   She was so beautiful and very sweet. So I went tonight and she was not there and was told that they   let her go.  So very Sad. Just iwhen I finds a cool place and cool girl now I got to find Some where else to go.  Why do places let the best girls go.  I miss you Kitten . Please bring back Kitten .

name: Chris B
text: Best place to be!!!

name: Travis Little
text: 3 stars because the atmosphere was nice mostly everybody was friendly and girls were hot. .but after ordering a few drinks throughout the night the waitress tried to sneak more beers on us that we did not order and we told her we didn't order none she told the bartender not to serve us because she thought we were playing games. .and a couple of the dancers tried to hustle saying somebody sent them over to us thinking we're drunk I guess but I don't fall for those tricks. .and the waitress stile my cigs off the table. Good time but be aware of the hustle.

name: Saquoia Seaberry
text:
Went there on 9/13/18 at about 6pm. So I walk in and the place is empty, I thought they weren’t open at first. I seat myself at the bar next to the only other gentleman in the club. I start to order a drink when the bartender informs me that women aren’t allowed into the club without a male escort? Like what? Is this the 19th century?
There wasn’t even a single girl there working. Now I know why the place was empty. If they won’t take my money another club will.

name: BRUCE MCKNIGHT
text: Monday afternoon 🔥 girls nice to visit there after 20 years... Bartender was extra sweet... Nice time

name: David McLain
text: The girls were less than ok...the real problem I had was that when I went to leave they told me that I owed for an additional drink, but I had been paying for each drink as I ordered(cash).  Made me realize, they are looking to scam you anyway possible!!!  Don’t go...never had this problem at the Furnace!

name: Joel Nunez
text: Worse place I've been 2 ask to clarify what was required for me to stay and they told me to leave. Most dirtiest service I have seen hope the place closes down.

text: Came here with a friend, last Easter( >:) had the best time.  Ace was our particular favourite!  Cant wait to come back this Easter.

name: Willie Gossom
text: I really enjoyed myself last night. That girl Ace is the best!! I definitely will be back on the 14th when I'm back in town😎😎😎

name: Benjamin Ward (Mr. Blue Benjamin)
text: the ladies were. Fantastic!! good vibes  but their bartenders are The Worst Ever!! they don't know how to actually make mixed drinks. They spill more alcohol on the counter then getting it your glass. they also have no drink specials which is dumb to me cause if the customers get free and loose then more drinks but 10+ dollars for bottom shelf liquor shots at a C+ venue is not enticing so damn the bartenders there go to the Furnace!! and yeah the ladies were awesome!!

text: I’ve been here twice and the club is pretty good. Girls are nice and the drinks are good.

name: Ethan Alexander
text: Me and my wife had an amazing time there! First time ever to be in a gentleman's club and it was an absolute great experience!

name: Misty Brown
text: This so-called establishment is nowhere I would ever recommend nor will I ever returned too! They Employe women, but a women CANT enter w out a MAN! They fail to tell you this on their website! Not even if ur Lesbian, You must have a man w u at all times! Total bs! Post it on ur website so ppl can stop Wasting their time!  The manager, tont, stated that they are a membership only facility , yet, u buy no membership! All lies n bs! Will never be bk and Unless you have a male companion I suggest you don’t even show up bc u WILL be turned away! And after reading the other reviews, I’m glad they saved me my $!!!! It almost seems like there are alternative motives at this “club!” Ima straight out ask, “What n who exactly r y’all hiding by not letting single women n ur Establishment?” Must be doing a lil something “fishy” to be the ONLY place not to allow single women in!!!! Js!

name: Andrew Henderson
text: They Tried to keep a photo copy of my id and credit card info. Had to pay in in cash after fighting with manger. I paid in cash after all this. I had to threaten to call  the authority to keep the copy after that. Place has gone down hill over the years last time going here after all this.  Girls are  average at best other place is in Birmingham better.  Watch out if you go.

text: This place is excellent. Great service smiling faces sexy women definitely Gona make a return trip and the DJ is pure awesomeness

text: It has great and beautiful girl a awesome vibe, a good place to chill out after a long day of work

name: Drew Edmondson
text: Girls were nice some lacking in lady department. But nice

name: Jason Smith
text:
Went there last night for the first time and had a bad experience. Security is beyond ridiculous. I got threatened with a taser because one security guard didn't like that I was sipping on my beer and trying to close my tab at 3:01. I know that makes no sense but that's what happened. The guys name is John I believe - 5 foot tall, bald headed, unethical black guy who eats too much protein and is easily intimidated. The "real" cop that was in there didn't help either. I have never been treated this poorly by any club in all the state's I travel to. This all happened even after spending over $100.

I paid for a beer that got snatched out of my hand and thrown onto the bartender while the guy was sparking the taser in the other hand. He then followed me outside, calling me names and playing with his taser while I was heading to my vehicle. Bartenders and servers were great and the girls were nice. Cigarettes said $5 but actually cost $8. A lap dance with clothes on is over priced in my opinion at $20 in a place like that. The atm charges you $7 to withdraw - you're better offer bringing cash with you.

Saw a manager at another bar afterward and he deeply apologized for the actions of the security guy. He agreed that the guy lost his temper far too easily and gave me a free pass for next time if I choose to go back. Not sure I'll be back. My luck would be that he have a gun next time and lose his cool and shoot me or someone else. Be very careful.

text: Nice place cold beer hot girls.  Very friendly

text: I had a great time 👍 My favorite was Cocoa

The ladies don't even have the etiquette either while walking with you to the vip section or while leaving...disgusting...to top it all the bartender charged me for drinks for each one of the ladies in the vip! Really you douchebag! darn this place man, go to furnace instead
